verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's tough trade tactics [V: have] caused the destruction of more than $ 1 trillion in market value , according to J.P. Morgan .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump 's tough trade tactics] have [V: caused] [ARG1: the destruction of more than $ 1 trillion in market value] , [ARGM-ADV: according to J.P. Morgan] .
President Donald Trump 's tough trade tactics have caused the destruction of more than $ 1 trillion in market value , [V: according] to J.P. Morgan .
